backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with access control, wallet validation, and CRUD-style profile operations gated by permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for major frontend files including auth, queries, pages, components, and match-3 game logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Creates the TanStack router and root layout with auth/profile gating and global providers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution link, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, and user dropdown driven by auth and profile state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form for entering and saving a user's display name with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/game/match3/engine.ts: Core Match-3 logic including board initialization, adjacency checks, swapping, and match detection.
frontend/src/game/match3/types.ts: Defines grid size, tile types, and core Match-3 data structures like Board, Tile, and Match.
frontend/src/game/match3/useMatch3Game.t: React hook managing Match-3 board state, tile selection, swaps, cascades, scoring, and restart logic.
frontend/src/game/three/layout.ts: Utility functions computing 3D world positions for tiles and stones using layout constants.
frontend/src/game/three/materials.ts: Maps tile types to Three.js colors and provides helpers for rendering stone colors.
frontend/src/game/three/StoneMatch3DBoar: 3D React Three Fiber scene rendering the Match-3 board with interactive stones, tiles, lighting, and selection effects.
frontend/src/game/three/useStoneAnimatio: Tracks previous board state and animation info, and provides a helper for animating stone movement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Simple auth hook exposing whether the user is authenticated based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and wallet addresses through an authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, dark mode theming, and custom styles for game tiles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectWallet.tsx: UI page for viewing, validating, linking, updating, and removing a user's wallet address with backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the 3D match‑3 game board, score display, and controls using the match‑3 game hook.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing hero content, user greeting, and navigation to the match‑3 game, using Internet Identity and profile data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and current issues, including authentication fixes and 3D game glitching tasks for Stone Match 3D.
